Text: SP ToursThanks for passing along the below address to me The tour guide was very nice but a bit inexperienced and certainly not with a luxury car It was good for a do it yourself tour if you already have an idea of what you want to see It actually confirmed for me that unless you really stay to become involved with the people Sao Paulo is a fairly shallow city historically and socially I hear however that there are many interesting colonial cities in Minas Gerais and Rio is only a minute flight away Hope all is well Mike Ms Sonia GO IN Office Cell City Tour approx hrs p R p R
